item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] current queued requests
item_prototype.description: current queued requests

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] max queued requests
item_prototype.description: max queued requests

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] current sessions
item_prototype.description: current sessions

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] max sessions
item_prototype.description: max sessions

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] session limit
item_prototype.description: configured session limit

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] bytes in
item_prototype.description: bytes in

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] bytes out
item_prototype.description: bytes out

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] denied requests
item_prototype.description: requests denied because of security concerns. - For tcp this is because of a matched tcp-request content rule. - For http this is because of a matched http-request or tarpit rule.

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] denied responses
item_prototype.description: responses denied because of security concerns. - For http this is because of a matched http-request rule, or "option checkcache".

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] connection errors
item_prototype.description: number of requests that encountered an error trying to connect to a backend server. The backend stat is the sum of the stat for all servers of that backend, plus any connection errors not associated with a particular server (such as the backend having no active servers)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] response errors
item_prototype.description: srv_abrt will be counted here also. Some other errors are: - write error on the client socket (won't be counted for the server stat) - failure applying filters to the response

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] conn retries
item_prototype.description: number of times a connection to a server was retried

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] conn redispatches
item_prototype.description: number of times a request was redispatched to another server. The server value counts the number of times that server was switched away from.

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] status
item_prototype.description: status (UP/DOWN/NOLB/MAINT/MAINT(via)...)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] weight
item_prototype.description: server weight (server), total weight (backend)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] active
item_prototype.description: server is active (server), number of active servers (backend)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] backup
item_prototype.description: server is backup (server), number of backup servers (backend)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] up-down transitions
item_prototype.description: number of UP->DOWN transitions. The backend counter counts transitions to the whole backend being down, rather than the sum of the counters for each server.

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] last change
item_prototype.description: number of seconds since the last UP<->DOWN transition

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] downtime
item_prototype.description: total downtime (in seconds). The value for the backend is the downtime for the whole backend, not the sum of the server downtime.

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] pid
item_prototype.description: process id (0 for first instance, 1 for second, ...)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] proxy id
item_prototype.description: unique proxy id

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] selection count
item_prototype.description: total number of times a server was selected, either for new sessions, or when re-dispatching. The server counter is the number of times that server was selected

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] type
item_prototype.description: (0=frontend, 1=backend, 2=server, 3=socket/listener)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] session rate
item_prototype.description: number of sessions per second over last elapsed second

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] max session rate
item_prototype.description: max number of new sessions per second

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] 1xx responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with 1xx code

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] 2xx responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with 2xx code

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] 3xx responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with 3xx code

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] 4xx responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with 4xx code

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] 5xx responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with 5xx code

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] other responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with other codes (protocol error)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] client aborts
item_prototype.description: number of data transfers aborted by the client

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] server aborts
item_prototype.description: number of data transfers aborted by the server (inc. in eresp)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] compressor in
item_prototype.description: number of HTTP response bytes fed to the compressor

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] compressor out
item_prototype.description: number of HTTP response bytes emitted by the compressor

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] compressor bypass
item_prototype.description: number of bytes that bypassed the HTTP compressor (CPU/BW limit)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] compressed responses
item_prototype.description: number of HTTP responses that were compressed

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] last session
item_prototype.description: number of seconds since last session assigned to server/backend

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] avg queue time
item_prototype.description: the average queue time in ms over the 1024 last requests

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] avg connect time
item_prototype.description: the average connect time in ms over the 1024 last requests

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}] avg response time
item_prototype.description: the average response time in ms over the 1024 last requests (0 for TCP)

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] current sessions
item_prototype.description: current sessions

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] max sessions
item_prototype.description: max sessions

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] session limit
item_prototype.description: configured session limit

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] bytes in
item_prototype.description: bytes in

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] bytes out
item_prototype.description: bytes out

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] denied requests
item_prototype.description: requests denied because of security concerns. - For tcp this is because of a matched tcp-request content rule. - For http this is because of a matched http-request or tarpit rule.

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] denied responses
item_prototype.description: responses denied because of security concerns. - For http this is because of a matched http-request rule, or "option checkcache".

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] request errors
item_prototype.description: request errors. Some of the possible causes are: - early termination from the client, before the request has been sent. - read error from the client - client timeout - client closed connection - various bad requests from the client. - request was tarpitted.

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] status
item_prototype.description: status (UP/DOWN/NOLB/MAINT/MAINT(via)...)

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] pid
item_prototype.description: process id (0 for first instance, 1 for second, ...)

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] proxy id
item_prototype.description: unique proxy id

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] type
item_prototype.description: (0=frontend, 1=backend, 2=server, 3=socket/listener)

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] session rate
item_prototype.description: number of sessions per second over last elapsed second

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] session rate limit
item_prototype.description: configured limit on new sessions per second

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] max session rate
item_prototype.description: max number of new sessions per second

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] 1xx responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with 1xx code

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] 2xx responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with 2xx code

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] 3xx responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with 3xx code

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] 4xx responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with 4xx code

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] 5xx responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with 5xx code

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] other responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with other codes (protocol error)

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] request rate
item_prototype.description: HTTP requests per second over last elapsed second

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] max request rate
item_prototype.description: max number of HTTP requests per second observed

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] requests total
item_prototype.description: total number of HTTP requests received

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] compressor in
item_prototype.description: number of HTTP response bytes fed to the compressor

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] compressor out
item_prototype.description: number of HTTP response bytes emitted by the compressor

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] compressor bypass
item_prototype.description: number of bytes that bypassed the HTTP compressor (CPU/BW limit)

item_prototype.name: [{#FRONTEND_NAME}] compressed responses
item_prototype.description: number of HTTP responses that were compressed

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server current queued requests
item_prototype.description: current queued requests

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server max queued requests
item_prototype.description: max queued requests

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server current sessions
item_prototype.description: current sessions

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server max sessions
item_prototype.description: max sessions

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server session limit
item_prototype.description: configured session limit

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server bytes in
item_prototype.description: bytes in

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server bytes out
item_prototype.description: bytes out

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server denied responses
item_prototype.description: responses denied because of security concerns. - For http this is because of a matched http-request rule, or "option checkcache".

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server connection errors
item_prototype.description: number of requests that encountered an error trying to connect to a backend server. The backend stat is the sum of the stat for all servers of that backend, plus any connection errors not associated with a particular server (such as the backend having no active servers)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server response errors
item_prototype.description: srv_abrt will be counted here also. Some other errors are: - write error on the client socket (won't be counted for the server stat) - failure applying filters to the response

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server conn retries
item_prototype.description: number of times a connection to a server was retried

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server conn redispatches
item_prototype.description: number of times a request was redispatched to another server. The server value counts the number of times that server was switched away from.

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server status
item_prototype.description: status (UP/DOWN/NOLB/MAINT/MAINT(via)...)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server weight
item_prototype.description: server weight (server), total weight (backend)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server active
item_prototype.description: server is active (server), number of active servers (backend)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server backup
item_prototype.description: server is backup (server), number of backup servers (backend)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server failed checks
item_prototype.description: number of failed checks. (Only counts checks failed when the server is up.)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server up-down transitions
item_prototype.description: number of UP->DOWN transitions. The backend counter counts transitions to the whole backend being down, rather than the sum of the counters for each server.

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server last change
item_prototype.description: number of seconds since the last UP<->DOWN transition

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server downtime
item_prototype.description: total downtime (in seconds). The value for the backend is the downtime for the whole backend, not the sum of the server downtime.

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server queue limit
item_prototype.description: configured maxqueue for the server, or nothing if the value is 0 (default, meaning no limit)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server pid
item_prototype.description: process id (0 for first instance, 1 for second, ...)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server proxy id
item_prototype.description: unique proxy id

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server server id
item_prototype.description: server id (unique inside a proxy)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server throttle
item_prototype.description: current throttle percentage for the server, when slowstart is active, or no value if not in slowstart

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server selection count
item_prototype.description: total number of times a server was selected, either for new sessions, or when re-dispatching. The server counter is the number of times that server was selected

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server server id
item_prototype.description: id of proxy/server if tracking is enabled

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server type
item_prototype.description: (0=frontend, 1=backend, 2=server, 3=socket/listener)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server session rate
item_prototype.description: number of sessions per second over last elapsed second

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server max session rate
item_prototype.description: max number of new sessions per second

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server health status
item_prototype.description: status of last health check, one of: UNK -> unknown INI -> initializing SOCKERR -> socket error L4OK -> check passed on layer 4, no upper layers testing enabled L4TOUT -> layer 1-4 timeout L4CON -> layer 1-4 connection problem, for example "Connection refused" (tcp rst) or "No route to host" (icmp) L6OK -> check passed on layer 6 L6TOUT -> layer 6 (SSL) timeout L6RSP -> layer 6 invalid response - protocol error L7OK -> check passed on layer 7 L7OKC -> check conditionally passed on layer 7, for example 404 with disable-on-404 L7TOUT -> layer 7 (HTTP/SMTP) timeout L7RSP -> layer 7 invalid response - protocol error L7STS -> layer 7 response error, for example HTTP 5xx

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server check code
item_prototype.description: layer5-7 code, if available

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server check duration
item_prototype.description: time in ms took to finish last health check

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server 1xx responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with 1xx code

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server 2xx responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with 2xx code

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server 3xx responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with 3xx code

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server 4xx responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with 4xx code

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server 5xx responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with 5xx code

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server other responses
item_prototype.description: http responses with other codes (protocol error)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server health check details
item_prototype.description: failed health checks details

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server client aborts
item_prototype.description: number of data transfers aborted by the client

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server server aborts
item_prototype.description: number of data transfers aborted by the server (inc. in eresp)

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server last session
item_prototype.description: number of seconds since last session assigned to server/backend

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server last health check
item_prototype.description: last health check contents or textual error

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server last agent check
item_prototype.description: last agent check contents or textual error

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server avg queue time
item_prototype.description: the average queue time in ms over the 1024 last requests

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server avg connect time
item_prototype.description: the average connect time in ms over the 1024 last requests

item_prototype.name: [{#BACKEND_NAME}/{#SERVER_NAME}] backend server avg response time
item_prototype.description: the average response time in ms over the 1024 last requests (0 for TCP)
